entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers late this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
